Actor - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation
object of class Actor is the basic element of the Space game.
Actor() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation.Actor
default constructor, call the constructor Actor(char icon), and set the defualt value of icon as 'A'

two-parameterd constructor
actors - Static variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
create a 2D array, which is the play area, row and colunm are the coordinate for the spaceship or asteroid in the game, the accessible field is private, means that it can not be changed outside
ActorTest - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation
junit test for Actor
ActorTest() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation.ActorTest
 
addAsteroid() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284_section310.simulation.SpaceExplorationSimulator
when the method being called, there are 10% chance to add an asteroid into the play ground accessiable field is private, so that it can't be changed outside the class 1, use Math.random()*(101-1+1)+1 to get a random value from 1-101, compare with the constant value CHANCE (which is 10), only when the random value is less than 10, there will be one more new asteroid added into the area 2, use Math.random()*(4-0+1)+0, to get a random value from 0-4, which decide the row coordinate for the new added asteroid, and put it into the far right column in the area; 3, if the Actor[new row][new column] where the new asteroid will be added is null, add the asteroid; if there's a spaceship, then remove ship and asteroid, and make the destroyed ship counter++; if there's another asteroid, then remove both (set as null)
